name: Weightless (ParadigmGames)
description:
---TEAM TroubledTrashCan---

Weightless is a hardcore box carrying sim, being a platformer where you have to manage how many boxes you're carrying in order to make tight jumps and careful maneuvers and to deliver every box in a level to the rocket.

CONTROLS:

X (gamepad R1) : Pick up
C/Down Arrow (gamepad L1) : Put Down/Throw
Arrow Keys : Move
R (gamepad Start) : Restart
